thread.title: Lionel Messi not rushing recovery for Argentina or El Clasico
thread.title_full: Lionel Messi not rushing recovery for Argentina or El Clasico - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Lionel Messi not rushing recovery for Argentina or El Clasico
text:
*Madrid:* Four-time World Player of the Year Lionel Messi has insisted he won't rush his recovery from knee ligament damage despite upcoming clashes with Brazil and Real Madrid for Argentina and Barcelona respectively.
*Lionel Messi*
Messi suffered a torn internal collateral ligament in his left knee during Barca's 2-1 win ... Â»
